Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black with lotus buds in added white outlines with added red centres above three white bands; below, part of rosette and lotus flower in white outline with red centres; exterior reserved with two brown bands with three dilute lines between.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis) (on the evidence of being included in Petrie 1886, pl. V.)
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the interior decoration, see Oxford AN1896-1908-G.141.46
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. V, no. 2)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1958) (phase 2)
